titleStmt.title: By the Major. To the Alderman of the ward of [blank]. Whereas the City of London, and the liberties thereof, is exceedingly pestered with rogues, vagabonds and sturdy beggars, aswel men as women, ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

titleStmt.title: By the Major. To the Alderman of the ward of [blank]. Whereas the City of London, and the liberties thereof, is exceedingly pestered with rogues, vagabonds and sturdy beggars, aswel men as women, ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, Printer to the honorable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Signed and dated at end: 22th of March, 1649. Sadler.
A blank is left after the words "ward of" in title.
An order for the apprehension of rogues.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffaringdon within" written into blank in title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
